parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240015) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandatory for electoral campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post explicitly refers to Brian Cristian, a candidate for the parliamentary elections, mentioning his achievements ("277 initiatives", "10 promulgated laws"), his political affiliation (USR), and encouraging voters to inform themselves correctly when choosing their representatives.  This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The use of hashtags (#briancristian, #USR, etc.) further amplifies its public reach. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The primary objective of the post is to positively influence voters' perception of Brian Cristian and encourage them to vote for him.  The emphasis on his accomplishments and the call to "inform yourselves correctly" are clearly intended to sway voters in his favor. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: While the post presents some factual information (number of initiatives, laws promulgated), it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The tone is promotional and self-congratulatory, focusing on highlighting the candidate's achievements to garner support, rather than providing balanced information.  It goes beyond the limits of journalistic information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The content is not a personal opinion; it's a carefully crafted message designed to promote a candidate's image and influence voting behavior. The inclusion of a website link and CMF number further reinforces its promotional nature.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2308499799504251</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Brian Cristian), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the end date is given as 1732867200, which needs further investigation to determine if it's after the official end of the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Brian Cristian), and goes beyond the limits of journalistic reporting by being promotional and self-serving. The presence of a CMF number further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda.  The paid nature of the Facebook post and its targeting of a specific region (Maramureș County) indicate a deliberate attempt to influence voters.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Brian Cristian</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID 2308499799504251) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Brian Cristian la alegerile parlamentare,  folosind un ton promotional și auto-laudativ, evidențiind realizările sale și îndemnând alegătorii să se informeze corect înainte de a vota. Postarea conține un număr CMF (11240015), specific materialelor de campanie electorală, și are ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru Brian Cristian.  Textul postării, "Când mulți parlamentari au mimat munca, eu am ajuns pe primul loc și la inițiative legislative: 277! Am deja 10 legi promulgate...", este clar orientat spre influențarea votului.  Având în vedere cheltuielile de sub 100 RON, conform datelor din Ad Library, și o estimare a audienței de 50.000-100.000 persoane, impactul acestei postări este semnificativ.  Contactul USR Maramureș este maramures@usrmm.ro și +40751926939.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
